info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McDowell County through 115 PM EDT... At 1244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Marion, or near Old Fort, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marion around 110 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Glenwood, Sugar Hill and Pleasant Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
